turns.content: Hello, am I speaking with Ramesh Gupta? This is Priya calling from QuickLend Financial Services regarding your personal loan account.
Who is this? I don't know what you're talking about, and I don't recall taking any loan from QuickLend. What is the purpose of this call?

Ramesh, I apologize if this call has caused any confusion. I'm calling about a personal loan account in your name with QuickLend Financial Services, with an outstanding balance of approximately $5,000. Can you please confirm if you're the Ramesh Gupta who took out this loan, so we can discuss the details further?
I don't know what you're talking about, I've never taken a loan from QuickLend. You must have the wrong person, I demand to speak to your supervisor, now!

Ramesh, I understand your concern and I'm happy to escalate this matter to my supervisor if needed. However, before I do that, may I just confirm your date of birth and address to ensure we're not mistaken about your identity? This will help me to verify the account details and resolve this matter quickly.

I'm not giving you any personal details, how do I know you're even a legitimate representative of QuickLend? I'm telling you, I don't have any loan with your company, so stop harassing me! Put your supervisor on the phone, or I'll report you to the authorities!

Ramesh, I apologize if my call has caused any distress. I understand your concerns about verification, and I assure you that I'm a legitimate representative of QuickLend Financial Services. If you'd like to verify my identity, you can call our customer service number, which is available on our website, and ask to be connected to me, Priya. I'm going to go ahead and escalate this call to my supervisor, as you've requested, and they'll be happy to discuss this further with you. Please hold for just a moment.

No, no, no! I don't want to hold, I want to speak to your supervisor now! Don't put me on hold, I'm not going to wait around while you try to verify some fake loan account. Just transfer the call to your supervisor, or I'll hang up!

Ramesh, I'm going to transfer the call to my supervisor right away. Please stay on the line for just a moment, and I'll connect you with them. My supervisor's name is Rachel, and she'll be able to assist you further with your concerns. I'm transferring the call now.

Fine, transfer the call already! I'm tired of wasting my time with you. And let me make one thing clear to your supervisor: I'm not paying a single rupee on a loan I never took! [muttering to himself] QuickLend, ridiculous...

Ramesh, I've transferred the call to my supervisor, Rachel. She'll be with you shortly. [pause] Rachel, this is Priya, I've transferred the call regarding the personal loan account in Ramesh Gupta's name. Ramesh, please go ahead and discuss this further with Rachel, she'll be happy to assist you. [call transfer complete]

Finally! Rachel, is that you? Listen, I don't know what kind of nonsense your employee Priya has been telling you, but I'm telling you, I don't have any loan with QuickLend. I demand you clear up this mess and stop harassing me!

Ramesh, this is Rachel, Supervisor at QuickLend Financial Services. I apologize for any inconvenience caused by the previous call. I've reviewed the account details, and I'd like to assure you that we take such matters seriously. Can you please confirm your date of birth and the address associated with your identification, so I can investigate this further and clarify the situation regarding the loan in question?

No, I won't give you any more information! You people are just trying to trap me. I've already told Priya, I don't have any loan with QuickLend. I've paid off all my debts, and I have all the records. You're just trying to extort money from me. I demand you stop this harassment and send me a written apology for this mistake. [raising voice] Otherwise, I'll take this to the consumer court!

Ramesh, I understand your frustration, and I apologize if our attempts to contact you have caused any distress. I want to assure you that our intention is not to extort money from you, but to resolve any potential issues with your account. I'm going to go ahead and mark this account as "disputed" and initiate an investigation. I'll also send you a written communication regarding this matter, as you've requested. Please allow us 7-10 working days to complete the investigation, and we'll be in touch with you thereafter to discuss the outcome.

[huffing] Fine, do what you have to do. But let me make it clear: I'm not paying a single rupee. And if I receive even a single call or letter from QuickLend after this, I'll take it as harassment and take action. Mark my words, I'll not be bullied by your company. [angrily] And don't think that just because you're "investigating", I'll forget about this. I'll be watching, and I'll make sure everyone knows about the kind of business QuickLend does. [HANGS UP]
